name: commute-connect
description: A dating app designed especially for introverted commuters who travel daily and often notice someone they like but are too shy to approach.

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend

author: Commute Connect Team
